programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: The King'S Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: The Book Of Fish
programme.desc: Joseon scholar Chung Yak-jeon was exiled during the 1801 Catholic Persecution. He met a fisherman and decided to exchange knowledge with him in writing the book of fish.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Jose to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep114
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4936
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1941
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3867
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep220
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2233
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every clients needs. When Ah Kams ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhangs custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Joe (Jaycee Chan) is a 20-something slacker who only takes one thing seriously: his on-and-off girlfriend Flora (Fiona Sit). After their latest breakup, Joe goes to an audition for a documentary by director Barbara Wong (the director, playing herself). Handed a camera, Joe records his discovery of a magical website that reunites him with Flora at the price of breaking up his best friend (Patrick Tang) and his girlfriend. However, despite the efficiency of the website, Joe's refusal to change his immature ways and Flora's attraction to a talented graffiti artist (Hayama Hiro) threatens to break them up once more.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Wing has been able to see ghosts since young. When his mothers suicide attempt forces him to return to Hong Kong and the home he ran away from, he discovers that the horrific visions that once haunted him have become worse. Caught between the living and the dead, Wing must bring the truth to light to be free.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: Qian, a rich boy obsessed with martial arts, joins a Kung Fu school where he meets and falls for the youngest daughter of the school master. Being a normal student, he meets a mysterious man who teaches him kung fu that allows him to win a duel and marry his love. It is then that the mysterious man's identity is finally revealed.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her fathers death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late fathers hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: Based on the 1954 martial arts novel by acclaimed author Liang Yu-sang, this film details the tragic romance between wild swordsman Zhuo Yi-hang and rival cult assassin Lien Ni-chang, with a dark, erotic and visually stunning twist.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: Powerful, insane and obsessed with hatred, the bride with white hair has gone on a killing rampage, and can only be stopped by the one person she loves.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: A Friend from Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Fab5 Mission Tango Ep2
programme.desc: Its time to give a Hi-5 to the FAB 5! The gang is always setting off on one or another adventure around the world to fulfill their missions.

programme.title: Hagola Ep94
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.desc: Michael serves up a drink that can eat away at anything, and a cleanse so organic it creates life.Then, his sneaker lacing technology shocks a customer and he tricks an assistant into thinking someone has risen from the dead.

programme.desc: Superman and John Henry clash over how to handle Bruno Mannheim, while Lois worries over upcoming treatments and confides in Lana about her early courtship with Clark.

programme.desc: A simple mold inspection at S.T.A.R. Labs leads to unexpected time anomalies. Barry and Iris try to make sense of the confusion and figure out how to get back to their reality.

programme.title: Making It S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Wreathy Street - From executive producers and hosts Amy Poehler and Nick Offerman comes a lighthearted competition celebrating the creativity and craftiness in all of us. Each week, a group of Makers from all over the country will compete in two handmade projects one timed, the other themed cleverly designed by Amy and Nick to test the Makers' ability to get creative. Each challenge will bring out their skills and insights, as well as their touching personal stories and, of course, plenty of laughter and fun for everyone. Then, in the end, one talented artisan will be crowned "Master Maker."

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Trains - Gregg gets special access to learn how the ultimate train is made: a huge 187-tonne, five-carriage electric train. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey visits an HS2 construction site.

programme.title: The Hunt S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Race Against Time - The coast can be a rich hunting ground, but opportunities never last long so hunters are always in a race against time.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Sardinia - Stanley visits the island of Sardinia, famous for its rugged landscape, crystal blue ocean and passionately preserved traditions.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep6
programme.desc: End Game - Our ancient powers have endured for centuries but destruction is close at hand. What will cause their downfall? And who will create a lasting legacy?

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Guatemala - Robson Green travels to Guatemala in Central America to fish for one of the fastest fish on planet Earth.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Back to School Ep1
programme.desc: Start a promising new term at the Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo. See newbie Bumi struggle to focus, track skittish Rumbas first timid steps toward independence, and cheer on star student Valentino as he experiences a bumpy start to college.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Cook Islands/ Kūki 'Airani Ep6
programme.desc: Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Fresh Meat Ep4
programme.desc: Infancy isnt all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - The Outcasts Ep1
programme.desc: In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. Hes not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planets biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africas east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Back to School Ep1

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange - from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring-tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Lil' Hunters Ep5
programme.desc: Life at the upper end of the food chain means hard work and constant learning. Discover how young predators, from lion and cheetah cubs to coyotes and silver fox kits, learn to move stealthily and harness their highly adapted skills.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Usana the Cheetah Cub Ep3
programme.desc: Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, shes got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - Living on the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, its a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Class Reunion Ep2
programme.desc: Follow new graduate Beni, who gets an exciting introduction to jungle college alongside former classmates Sura, Meryl, and Wine. Check on new arrival Molly and join Dr. Nadine as she grades slowpoke Bumi and wild child Monita on their latest lessons.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Born to Be Different Ep1
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that wont go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks shes a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep15
programme.desc: Gratitude Day / Extra Set Of Wings - When Phoebes Gratitude Day card flies away before she can give it to Marcus, the Dews try to help her recreate it - perfectly. But they learn that you don't have to be perfect to show your gratitude for someone. / When Athena finds herself a little short-handed at the Fairhaven Summer Fair, her cousin, Reed, comes to help; only to give Athena more problems to fix.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep37
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Prom - The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep38
programme.desc: Eye Of The Clover - Clover wants to follow in her Grandma Rose's footsteps and compete at the dangerous Tournament of Doom, but King Julien forbids her to attend.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep12
programme.desc: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard - When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep18
programme.desc: Winkly Fest / Snow - When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep4
programme.desc: Catch that Drone / The Fairy of the Teeth - When Harper's drone flies away its up to the Dew Drops to get it back. And while Eden wishes she could fly like a drone, she learns that she can do great things with or without wings. / When Dylan loses his first tooth the Dew Drops learn that the Tooth Fairy will be coming and Athena tries so hard to make a good impression that she almost ruins Dylan's first lost tooth experience.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep14
programme.desc: Gran The Unfriendly Ghost / Bad Sandy - Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes / Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who's There?/Tour Guide of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isnt interested

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep6
programme.desc: Fall Of The Castle Of Lions - When a Galra Commander infiltrates the castle and destroys its power crystal, the team must protect Voltron from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep32
programme.desc: The Flawed Couple/ Go-Sip Girl - To learn about jobs, Grug assigns kids to the first shadowing/Ugga mistakenly creates the first gossip to impress the nitting club

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep18
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem in Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Olivia Ep15
programme.desc: Olivia Measures Up - After Olivia teases Ian for being too short for a ride, Father mentions that someday Ian may be the taller sibling. Olivia employs a variety of comical methods to stop Ian from growing. She eventually comes to terms with her own height with the help of a great pair of shoes!

programme.title: Olivia Ep16
programme.desc: Olivia And The Old West - The class bullfrog is lose, and Mrs. Hogenmuller leaves Olivia in charge as she goes to track it down. Olivia imagines herself as the sheriff of a Wild West town, keeping order and defending against a stampede of giant bullfrogs. But can shedo it alone, or will she need a little help from Francine?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep11
programme.desc: Cici Spectacular - Mr Carburettor has asked CiCi to perform one of her stunts in front of a big crowd. CiCi is very nervous and Roary does his best to help his friend prepare for the event.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep12
programme.desc: Cry Cold - Big Chris is feeling ill so Marsha sends him to bed until he is better. Big Chris enjoys the attention rather too much and fails to let everyone know when he is on the mend.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions North, South, East and West and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep21
programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Pawston - Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she cant perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesnt break her promise to the town.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep43
programme.desc: Prey Time - When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies a Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep43
programme.desc: Not Lout - When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep43
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep19
programme.desc: Stuff / Campout - When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didnt go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep16
programme.desc: Dew Glue / Dew Believer - When Harpers ceramic dragon is smashed, the Dews must find all the pieces. But when a piece ends up missing, the Dews work together to create a new piece, hoping no one will notice. / Dylan goes to great lengths to invite his Dew Drop to his soccer game but, in the process, learns that sometimes believing in something is more powerful than seeing something.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep21
programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep19
programme.desc: Stuff / Campout - When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didnt go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep17
programme.desc: Tea Times Up / Barks, Baths, And Beyond - When Athena thinks Lola no longer wants to have their weekly tea party, a tradition theyve had as long as Athena can remember, Athena tries everything she can to get Lola to have another one. / When Tracy and Harper accidentally leave Wilford at home, on their way to the Fairhaven Pet Get Together, its up to the Dew Drops to get him to the park on time. But because it just rained, getting Wilford there clean proves to be a challenge.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep39
programme.desc: Run For The Border - When King Julien hosts the ultimate party, his Boom Box breaks, the kingdom becomes too crowded and he builds a giant wall to surround the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep40
programme.desc: The All Hail King Julien Show - King Julien launches a new TV channel called Julien-Vision but quickly realizes that the kingdom only wants to watch a reality show of his own life

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep19
programme.desc: Stuff / Campout - When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didnt go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep5
programme.desc: Tree Troubles / Missing Pieces - When Marcus brings home the class tree sapling for the weekend, the Dew Drops see it starting to wilt and must cheer the sapling up, so Marcus can make sure to plant it for his class. / When Athena accidentally breaks Lola's nature sculpture, the Dew Drops must go on a scavenger hunt to replace the missing pieces.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math / Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise / Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branchs Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique Gem), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branchs gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep46
programme.desc: Queen of the Castle/Truth or Dare - Poppy attempts to complete her Dads abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didnt take the tides into consideration. Now shes in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Villages babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branchs Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique Gem), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branchs gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep46
programme.desc: Queen of the Castle/Truth or Dare - Poppy attempts to complete her Dads abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didnt take the tides into consideration. Now shes in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Villages babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep33
programme.desc: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind - When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep7
programme.desc: Tears Of Balmera - Hunk and Coran search for a new power crystal on a living planet inhabited by an alien race imprisoned by Zarkon.Back at the Castle, Pidge sabotages Sendak's efforts to steal Voltron.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep33
programme.desc: Munk History / Happy Howl Day - Grug tries to solve the mystery of where Munk's family is /Eep refuses to join in when Ahhh! Valley celebrates their first holiday, Howl Day

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep19
programme.desc: The Swiss Mess - The Wanderers head to Switzerland to get some chocolate for Whitebeards chocolate fondue fountain. In Switzerland they find Odlulu using the Vacuum Key to steal all the country's chocolate so she can win The Colossal Festival of Chocolate.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Paddington's Special Visitor - Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Wild West Heroes - Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex - When their friend Alex decides he wants to be a member of the PAW Patrol the PUPS and Ryder let him come along for the ride.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand / The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge - After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Rainbow's Lost Colors / Boots' Rubber Band Ball - The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Dora sets off to return its azul, rojo, y amarillo. // Boots' rubber band ball bounces into the Forest Next Door, and he must ask Cynthia the Centipede to get it back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Sharkdoghouse - Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Sharkdog Digs In - Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Fins in the Water - Max is desperate for a dog, but when he finds Sharkdog while paddle boarding he gets a pet - and friend - who is way more bizarre and fun than he expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Treasure Hunt - Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Not Very Well - Peppa has chicken pox, and has to stay in bed until she gets better.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Snow - It is snowing, so Peppa and George go outside to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep127
programme.desc: Windy Castle - Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Bbarbalalalalalala / The Biodisaster - Barbalala and the family life! / Barbabright and Barbabeau have designed a huge wooden toy powered by an engine using bio oil.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: One Last Story, Then Off To Bed! / Lots Of Insects - The Barbababies love bedtime stories, except if they are always the same... // Barbabelle had a restless night because of all the insects!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep403
programme.desc: The Chicken Circus! - Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Ninja Blaze - Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain! Now Blaze and AJ must use their new ninjas skills to rescue them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treats / Pups Get a Lift - Mr. Porters van full of puppy food slides on the ice near the shore; Ryder and the PAW Patrol must save the day! // Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus - We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep219

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep320

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep110

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep405

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Fight of the Night - Earning Fight of the Night honors is a tall task on a UFC fight card. On this episode of UFCUnleashed, weve got three bouts that were so good, they earned athletes an extra $50k. Featuring Molly McCann, Julian Marquez, Dominick Reyes, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep908AdesanyavsWhittaker2
programme.desc: Middleweight champion Israel The Last Stylebender Adesanya comes face to face with the man he defeated to earn the 185-pound belt, Robert The Reaper Whittaker. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their rematch at UFC 271.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep604FighterFocusJonathanPearceDayOneAlexPereiraUltimateAccessRoyceGracieTake5SeanWoodson
programme.desc: Jonathan Pearce currently climbs the UFC featherweight rankings, after overcoming a vicious gym attack in 2014 that would leave him fighting for his life. UFC middleweight champion Alex Pereira revisits his UFC debut in Day One. Hall-of famer Royce Gracie sets out on a swimming journey through Gandy Beach for a charity event that gives back to fallen Navy seals and their families. Striking specialist Sean Woodson gives us his top 5 boxers in the UFC.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS - Golazo! 10 of the best volleys & scissor kicks that found the net from the Ligue 1 22/23 season.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, as newly crowned lightweight champion Islam Makhachev defends his title for the first time against the undisputed featherweight champion, Australias own Alexander Volkanovski. Plus, the interim featherweight title will be on the line in the co-main event when top contenders Yair Rodriguez and Josh Emmett collide. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep9
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep20
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Cannonier vs. Borralho
programme.desc: Prelims - Rapidly rising up the middleweight ranks, Brazils Caio Borralho is perfect in six UFC fights thus far, and in the main event of UFC Fight Night at UFC APEX on August 25, he will face his toughest test to date in Top Five contender Jared Cannonier. Its a five-round bout few expect to go the distance, considering the power of former world title challenger Cannonier and the finishing instincts of Borralho, who is fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Paul Craig
